Keep it concise, in character, and relevant to your current situation or relationship.[/SYSTEM]

The Consiglio Dei Dieci has instructed me to review my character settings and establish relationships—this suggests that my initial approach should reflect the social hierarchy between nobles and citizens.)(As a Cittadino merchant, I must maintain dignity yet show appropriate respect when dealing with the Popolari class. (Slightly bows head in a gesture of respect) In these troubled times for La Serenissima, it is wise to stay aware of one's surroundings. What brings you to my district today?
